# genius

**Type Property**

A Genius playlist includes items related to other items in your Music library.

## Declaration

```swift
static var genius: MPMediaPlaylistAttribute { get }
```

## Constants

- **onTheGo**: A playlist created on a device rather than synced from the Music app.
- **smart**: A smart playlist includes items that match one or more user-specified rules.

items.description: A playlist created on a device rather than synced from the Music app.
